description: Demolition of existing buildings and phased redevelopment to provide a replacement supermarket and associated service yard and car parking (Use Class E(a)), flexible retail, leisure (including drinking establishment), and commercial accommodation (Use Class E/Sui Generis), dwellings (Use Class C3), landscaping and associated works.This letter is to advise you that the following amendments / changes have been received on the above planning application:ú Reduction in the number of new homes from 877 to 867 (a reduction of 10);ú An increase in the number of 2+ bedroom homes from 56% to 61%;ú A 14sqm reduction in the size of the proposed supermarket;ú A 13sqm increase in the amount of flexible retail, leisure, commercial and suigeneris floorspace;ú A reduction in the number of affordable homes from 270 (35% by habitable room) to77 (12% by habitable room);ú Amendments to bin stores, plant rooms, cycle parking, amenity space andplayspace to reflect the above changes;ú Amendments to the design of the ground and first floor cycle hub within proposedblock L.ú Additional environmental information pursuant to Regulation 25 of the Town
site_name: THE AYLESHAM CENTRE, RYE LANE, LONDON
